scripts.test: riteway -r esm src/**/*.test.js src/**/*.test.jsx | tap-nirvana && echo 'Test complete.'
scripts.test:watch: chokidar src/**/*.test.js src/**/*.test.jsx -c "clear && yarn run -s test" --initial --silent
scripts.watch: chokidar src -c "clear && yarn run -s lint && yarn run -s test" --initial --silent
